article: american airlines , the airline owned by the amr corp. , said late on tuesday that it expected to cancel as many as ### flights -- more than a fifth of its daily total -- to unk its fleet of ### md-## jetliners to make sure a wiring bundle in the wheel wells was stowed properly .
